text: Bi rasti jina cihane ji hecweki avek e, ku me ewa ji ezmana hinartiye, idi bi we ave, ewa hesenaiyen zemine ku meriv u taris ji wan dixun, bi teve hev hesin dibin (wusa hesinaye ce dibe) zemin bi wan hesnayiyan xemla xwe digire u zemin te xemilandine (di we gave da idi) kesen zemin goman kirine, ku dikarin (xurinen xwe ji wan hesinayan) hildin. (Di we gave da) fermana me di sev u royan da (bi tesqeledana) wan hesinayan hatiye, idi me ewan hesinayan bi rehe wan va durut, te digo qey zemin (hej berya naha da bi wan hesinayan nehatibu) xemilandine (qe tu tist li ser zemin nemaye). Em beratan ji bona komale ramankar ra vedikin
